column1: the door has been open to let them through.
on a ouvert les portes pour laisser le passage.
Let's go look for N'Cho Norbert; he will come through.
Allons-y chercher N'Cho Norbert, il va passer.
We've come out; here we are.
We carried our stuff; here we are.
Nous avons chargé des baggages, voilà.
The Agban girls are well-dressed; they are arriving.
Les filles Agban sont bien habillées, elles arrivent.
afterwards, you'll saw that you didn't see anything that the Agbans did.
après vous allez dire que vous n'avez rien vu de ce que les Agban ont fait.
